All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Account
Declaration API for bank accounts and implementation general methods
AccountTests
 
AccountType
All accounts type for registration
Bank
Declaration API for bank operations
BankImp
Class where users and accounts are stored and which provides API for bank`s operations
BaseTransaction
Record for logging bank operations
CentralBank
Head of all banks class where banks are stored banks it notifier banks for accrual and day-updating
Client
Declaration Clients general methods
ClientImp
Class where data about clients are stored
CreditAccount
Credit account amount can be less 0 when happens recalculating account bank withdrawal commission
DebitAccount
Debit account amount cannot be less 0 when happens recalculating account bank refill interest on balance
DepositAccount
Deposit account amount cannot be less 0 when happens recalculating account bank refill interest on balance
InvalidAccountIdException
Exception when in bank`s operation was got wrong AccountID could call in @see BankImp#transfer
InvalidAmountException
Exception when amount less than 0 could call in @see BankImp#dayRecalculate @see CentralBank#notifyBanksAboutNewDay and @see Account#increaseHideAmount
InvalidBankIdException
Exception when in bank`s operation was got wrong BankID
InvalidClientIdException
Exception when in bank`s operation was got wrong ClientID
InvalidDataForRegistrationBankException
Exception when at registration was got wrong data could call in @see CentralBank#registration
InvalidRefillAmountException
Exception when in bank`s operation was refill amount less 0
InvalidTransactionIdException
Exception when in bank`s cancellation was got wrong TransactionID
InvalidTransferAmountException
Exception class that can be called in @see CentralBank#transfer
Main
 
Message
Record for notifying clients
Publisher
Declaration methods for pattern observer who publish notification
Subscriber
Declaration methods for pattern observer who accept notification
Ticker
Service for time management
Transaction
abstract class for logging bank operations
Transfer
This class like record but have union type Transaction
